item.title: Open House
item.description:
Come join our celebration of APL history at the Computer Museum Open House on Saturday, October 25, 2025!
The event will be held in the Davis Centre "Fishbowl" (DC 1301), and will run from 11:00am to 4:00pm. We will have various APL-related artifacts on display, along with interactive retro computers and some of our recent acquisitions. There will be guest exhibits from the KW Computer Heritage Group as well as mathematics alumni Steve McDowell joining us at 1:30PM to talk about his experiences as one of the developers of Waterloo microAPL: The Story of Waterloo microAPL.
Our Open House is free to attend, and all visitors are welcome!

item.title: SVPRO & Hot Chocolate
item.description: Next Monday the Sexual Violence Prevention and Response Office (SVPRO) will be joining us for the first hour of our meeting to talk about their role on campus, sexual safety, and resources available to us. SVPRO is the support system for those who have experienced sexual violence on campus and they also work to prevent it through training and awareness initiatives. You may be familiar with their 'consent week' events or 'red zone' awareness campaign (if not, this is a great time to learn about that). This is also an opportunity to ask questions or pass on feedback you might have for the university related to this topic. Also, hot chocolate will be served!! With marshmallows!! And whipped cream!! Yay!!

item.title: Discussion Night
item.description:
We are excited to announce our next event of the term, a philosophy discussion night in collaboration with the Wilfrid Laurier University Philosophy Club! The event will begin at 6pm with 30 minutes of philosophy themed games and icebreakers. From 6:30-8:30pm, we will break into groups to discuss philosophy questions.
The event is open to everyone of all majors/experience levels, and all topics or terminology will be briefly explained before each discussion begins to ensure everyone is on the same page.
WHEN: Thursday, October 30th 6pm-8:30pm WHERE: Laurier Campus, ARTS 2C17 (Arts C wing C)
As the discussion night will be held at Laurier University, we will post detailed instructions for how to get there before the event. The WLU interactive map can be found in our linktree.
If you would like to submit a discussion topic question ahead of time, you can do so through the form in our linktree.
We hope to see you there!

item.title: STANK: Serve's Thanksgiving Annual N(v)olleyball Kompetition
item.description: ðŸ¥§ Prepare for a Feast of Fierce Volleyball! ðŸ¦ƒ As the leaves turn and the holiday spirit fills the air, itâ€™s time for STANK: Serveâ€™s Thanksgiving Annual N(v)olleyball Kompetition! Event Details: ðŸ Date: Saturday, November 15th-16th (Overnight) â° Time: 8pm to 8am ðŸ“ Location: PAC Main Gym + Small Gym ðŸ‚ Team Sign-Up Form your crew of 6 to 9 players (only UWaterloo students with a valid athletics membership or alumni with a day pass) and choose your division: semi-competitive or competitive. (Note: A female libero is required to serve for a middle.) âš ï¸ NEW Semi-Comp Sign-Up Rules (Read Carefully!) To keep play balanced and fair this season: - Any male-identifying player rated Level 5 or of Level 5 ability must set or lib on a semi-comp team. - If you attended UW prior to the 5-level system (graduated before Fall 2023), the same rule applies if you were rated Level 4. - Spring levels are not included in this consideration. - If thereâ€™s any confusion, please reach out to an exec for clarification. - If your team has a Level 5 male player signed up for semi-comp, contact an exec to verify the validity of your team. - Players who are not evaluated this term may be removed from your team on the day of or asked to set/lib if necessary. ðŸ’° Pricing Regular (still fresh out of the coop): Register by Nov 3rd for $200 Both the form and payment must be completed by Nov 3rd @ 11:59pm. ðŸ“ How to Register Make your payment: https://warrior.uwaterloo.ca/Program/GetProgramDetails?courseId=e7072bd1-0754-4e99-9fbe-04a18228cfe1 Fill out the form: https://forms.office.com/r/twpLDkzmhD @everyone ðŸ Letâ€™s spice up the season, rally together, and make this Thanksgiving one to remember!
